text: Can I somehow unset the default value in CM fields? E.g. the form field, or follow-up email field...

Has anyone been able to create a custom form module using this documentation?
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/how-to-create-a-form-module-in-a-custom-module>

It says that you should just copy/paste default module code and be able to keep all the default form module functionality but i have not been successful. The form field does not have all these options and the only other field types that the custom module has are follow up emails, sf campaign and workflow. Really would like to get the "notifications_are_overridden" ones to work.
Hey <@UGCPXTKMW>! The field types are all listed under #4- for example, the field `notifications_are_overridden` is actually a boolean, not it's own field type.

Hi <@UBFA10FMF>, pasting the code on that page into a custom module gives the following warning: `'module' is disabled in this context`. Also: please see my question above regarding unsetting fields :pray:
